price: 105. Mes versets ne vous étaient-ils pas récités, que pourtant vous osiez démentir ?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alam takun āyātī tut'lā ʿalaykum fakuntum bihā tukadhibūna
